text: 244 Tower Hamlets Local Plan BACK TO POLICIES allowing for the loss of office floorspace in the City Fringe to allow for hotel development risks resulting in an oversupply of hotels and an uncoordinated and piecemeal loss of office space. 15.68 Parts 3-5 require marketing evidence covering a continuous period of at least 12 months (or 24 months in the case of Part 4) in order to
